{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=DSL-G31 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=07/27/2009 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=SGE |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=EoL |type=wireless router,dsl modem |fcc_id=MSQDSL-G31,QMPM505 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM6348S;BCM6348SKFBG; |cpu1_cspeed=256 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=KH29LV320DBTC-70G |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M12L64164A-7T |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag=yes,, 12-pad header,, |serial=yes,, 4-pad header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4318E;BCM4318EKFBG; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM5325E;BCM5325EKQMG; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=ADSL Line Driver;Broadcom;BCM6301;BCM6301KSGT;1; ,,, 2.4GHz Front End Module;SiGe;SE2521A;SiGe, 2521A60, 8211J;1;<!--;24-pin, LGA;--> |flags=ADSL2+, schematics |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|802.11g Wireless ADSL Router}} :[http://www.asus.com/Networks/ADSL_Modem_Routers/DSLG31/ Product page]
"[https://fccid.io/document.php?id=767656 GAW5.3Z33-5]", "REV: 0.2 10/30/06" would appear to :be silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. See also [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=767666 FCC Schematics] and [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=767662 Parts List] ([[T&W]]/[[SGE]]).. :MX29 - Macronix, KH29 - [http://www.kynix.com/Detail/982501/KH29LV320DBTC-70G.html Kynix] (MXIC), EN29 - Eon *[http://www.speedguide.net/routers/asus-dsl-g31-80211g-wireless-adsl-router-695 ''Asus DSL-G31'' on SpeedGuide.net] :Per [http://www.modem-help.co.uk/ASUSTeK/DSL-G31-Wireless-G-ADSL-Gateway.html?info=1 modem-help], this device uses BCM6348. *[https://www.asus.com/event/network/EOL-product/ ''End-of-Life Product List'' on '''ASUS''']
